Reference

Setup functions

Functions setting up your GCP configuration

cr_bucket_get()

Get Cloud Storage bucket

cr_bucket_set()

Set the Cloud Storage bucket for your Cloud Build Service

cr_email_get()

Get the cloud build email that is set in CR_BUILD_EMAIL

cr_email_set()

Set cloud build email

cr_project_get()

Get ProjectId

cr_project_set()

Set the projectId for your CloudRun services

cr_region_get()

Get Region Set

cr_region_set()

Set the endpoint for your CloudRun services

Deployment functions

Functions for deploying useful applications

cr_deploy_docker()

Deploy a Dockerfile so it will be built on ContainerRegistry

cr_deploy_run()

Deploy an R plumber script to Cloud Run

Cloud Build functions

Functions for working with Cloud Build

cr_build()

Starts a build with the specified configuration.

cr_build_make()

Make a Cloud Build object out of a cloudbuild.yml file

cr_build_schedule_http()

Create a Cloud Scheduler HTTP target from a Cloud Build object

cr_build_status()

Returns information about a previously requested build.

cr_build_upload_gcs()

Create a StorageSource

cr_build_wait()

Wait for a Build to run

cr_build_write()

Write out a Build object to cloudbuild.yaml

cr_buildstep()

Create a yaml build step

cr_buildstep_decrypt()

Create a build step for decrypting files via KMS

cr_buildstep_df()

Convert a data.frame into cr_buildstep

cr_buildstep_docker()

Create a build step to build and push a docker image

cr_dockerfile()

Create Dockerfile in the deployment folder

Build()

Build Object

Source()

Source Object

RepoSource()

RepoSource Object

StorageSource()

StorageSource Object

Yaml()

Helper to create yaml files

Cloud Run functions

Functions for working with Cloud Run deployments

cr_run()

Create a CloudRun service.

cr_run_get()

Get information about a Cloud Run service.

cr_run_list()

List CloudRun services.

cr_deploy_docker()

Deploy a Dockerfile so it will be built on ContainerRegistry

cr_deploy_run()

Deploy an R plumber script to Cloud Run

Cloud Scheduler functions

Functions for working with Cloud Scheduler

cr_schedule()

Creates a Cloud Scheduler job.

cr_schedule_list()

Lists Cloud Scheduler jobs.

Job()

Job Object

HttpTarget()

HttpTarget Object
